title: NASA & Boeing To "Shape Future Of Aviation" With X-66A
summary: The X-66A has the potential to shape the future of aviation by informing the development of a new generation of sustainable single-aisle aircraft.

title: Firefly Aerospace Purchases Remaining Virgin Orbit Assets
summary: Firefly Aerospace has reached an agreement to acquire the remaining assets of Virgin Orbit as part of Virgin Orbit's ongoing bankruptcy proceedings.

title: US House Members Introduce Bill To Make NOAA A Independent Agency
summary: A group of US House members have introduced a bill seeking to transform the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) into an independent agency while retaining its commercial space responsibilities within the Commerce Department.

title: Space Force Assigns SpaceX & ULA New Security Missions
summary: The US Space Force launch procurement office has announced that an additional 12 missions have been assigned to SpaceX and United Launch Alliance (ULA) under the National Security Space Launch Phase 2 contract.

title: Space Force extends Palantir’s data-as-a-service contracts
summary: The Space Force awarded data analytics company Palantir $110.3 million in contract extensions for the company’s cloud-based data services.
